name: the edge of the woods
description:
THIS GAME WILL ONLY WORK ON WINDOWS OR A WINDOWS EMULATOR SORRY!!

I'm currently learning how to use VB.NET which is a pretty limiting engine to make videogames on, but I have created a short story in it. It's not really a game, more of a text adventure, but it would be cool if more people tried out VB

- sometimes in the game it looks like the button isn't working, don't worry, its for *~atmosphere~*
